Episode.title: I Got This on Lock
Episode.summary: Ghost is presented with a business opportunity that could take the clubs to the next level, but must outshine devious new rivals, all while looking over his shoulder for Lobosâ€™s revenge. Tommy reunites with Tasha in a business scheme, while he also tries to keep a new drug contact under control and protect his reputation in the streets. Tasha and Ghost are tested when Tariq crosses a line.
